resources.string: This application runs in portrait mode and uses front camera only. Recommended distance between camera and photographed face is 2m. It is possible to zoom in to have better preview.
Could not initialize background verification and enhancement. Application will run without it.
Could not initialize shadow removal. Application will run without it.
ERROR! Image Could not be Saved.
Could not make a picture. Make sure that there is exactly one rectangle around the face and it is fully visible.
Please wait while the picture is being processed. It will be displayed soon. It can take few seconds.
The picture was successfully saved in: %s
Make sure that the image fulfills all requirements
